Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual clinical sites which will include information on labs being held at that site for the given quarter (Clinical site general information on labs held at that location dates and times of all labs held there).'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'When the offensive player takes a shot the product shall simulate the sound of a ship at sea.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

'Pre-paid cards shall be distributed via email or via a printed paper card.': Functional Suitability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'No lead evaluation will complete in a time period longer than 25 seconds for 97% of all leads processed.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall be able to display calendar dates and times according to the user’s locale. 90% of survey respondents from each target market country will find that the date and time formatting of the product is correct.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

The list of possible reason codes must be derived based on the type of transaction and the industry that the merchant belongs to according to the business rules defined for the Disputes System.': Functional Suitability
'Only authorized personnel can access customer records in the database.': Security

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Staff members shall be able to complete a set of tasks in a timely manner.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The search for recycled parts shall take no longer than 15 seconds. The search results shall be returned in under 15 seconds.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Users should only have to navigate through a maximum of 4 pages to create an account with the website.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'All credit card information will be encrypted in the database.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall be easy to use. 90% of users will be able to successfully reserve a conference room within 5 minutes of product use.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by users familiar with websites'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: The system shall be easy to use by callers and supervisors. Callers and supervisors must be able to accomplish any system task within 2 minutes.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'When a shot is marked as a miss the product shall simulate the sound of a shot missing its target.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'When a game is ended the product shall allow each player to remove himself or herself from the list of players.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow a user to identify himself or herself as a player.': Functional Suitability
'When a game is ended the product shall notify the players that the game is ended.': Functional Suitability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'When a game is ended the product shall allow each player to identify himself or herself as an available player in the list of players.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall be used within the specifications defined by the computers used by the Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Total lead cycle time must be completed in 5 minutes for 90% of lead volume between the business hours of 8AM CST to 8PM CST; then 3 minutes for 99% of lead volume during off business hours.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The Dispute System shall provide the users with the ability to follow up on a dispute case via follow-up actions. The list of available follow up actions for a given dispute case must be filtered by the status of the case and the access level of the user.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Letters application. This will allow the Disputes application to request letters as part of the dispute initiation and dispute follow up process. All letter requests must be sent to the Print Letter Utility application.': Compatibility

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall provide Asynchronous Messaging.The product shall provide asynchronous messaging to enable parallel processing and reduce the overhead in communications'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Maintenance releases will be offered to customers once a year. The releases shall take no longer than 5 minutes for 80% of the customer base to install.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The Disputes System must provide a confirmation to the user upon the creation of ticket retrieval request that contains the following information; the dispute case number the type of retrieval requested (copy original or portfolio) and the date that the merchant response is due.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System shall allow the user to create or initiate a chargeback request. The system must prompt the user to enter the required information to initiate a chargeback request. The chargeback request results in a printed chargeback notification that is sent to merchant indicating that their account will be charged back if no proof is provided that the disputed transaction is valid.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System must allow the users to select disputable transactions (based on the age of the transaction) from a user interface and initiate a dispute (ticket retrieval request or chargeback notification) on the selected transaction.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System shall record the name of the user and the date for any activity that creates or modifies the disputes case in the system. A detailed history of the actions taken on the case including the date and the user that performed the action must be maintained for auditing purposes.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System must provide the user the ability to initiate a single dispute case on multiple transactions that belong to a single merchant.': Functional Suitability
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System will provide the user the ability to create or initiate a ticket retrieval request. As part of ticket retrieval creation process the system must prompt the user to enter all the required information to create the ticket retrieval request. The ticket retrieval request is a document that is sent to merchant inquiring the validity of a transaction.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System shall provide the users the ability to view the history of all activities that have occurred on the dispute case.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System must provide the ability to view existing dispute cases.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.': Functional Suitability
'The Dispute System shall provide the users with the ability to follow up on a dispute case via follow-up actions. The list of available follow up actions for a given dispute case must be filtered by the status of the case and the access level of the user.': Functional Suitability

'The product shall send a meeting confirmation to the meeting organizer.': Functional Suitability

A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.': Functional Suitability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The user shall easily locate instructions while using the product. User help can be found within 90% of the system.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall prevent a player from viewing the offensive or defensive grids of the other player.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'When a shot is marked as a hit the product shall simulate the sound of a shot hitting its target.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The adjuster shall review the collision estimate.': Functional Suitability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The adjuster shall request a recycled parts audit of the collision estimate.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Each page shall contain a similar format with action items in one location and navigation buttons in a different location.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The Disputes System must prevent users from accessing any dispute cases that do not belong to their cardholder base.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall be able to display a report of needed classes for a given quarter for all cohorts of all programs for Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members’ planning purposes.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall free of computer viruses.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall locate the preferred repair facility with the highest ratings for the input criteria'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall provide Portals.The product shall help System Administrators to analyze the transactions with ad-hoc reporting and KPIs (Key Performance Indicators)'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'For each shot the product shall notify the players whether the shot was a hit or miss.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The website should use Flash to provide animation on the home page.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'System shall automatically update the main page of the website every Friday and show the 4 latest movies that have been added to the website.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The Disputes application shall be available 24x7x365 with the exception of the following scheduled maintenance windows. Monday – Saturday 3:00am to 4:00am EST Sunday 1:00amd to 5:00am EST'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting cohorts including but not limited to changes to the sequence for a cohort’s program of study and changes to a given week’s schedule (lab cancelled this week due to instructor illness).'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The preferred repair facility ratings shall be saved within 5 seconds. The save shall occur within 5 seconds.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The search for the preferred repair facility shall take no longer than 8 seconds. The preferred repair facility is returned within 8 seconds'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The product must support Mozilla Firefox 1.0 and above.': Compatibility
The product shall be internet browser independent.The product must run using Internet Explorer and Netscape Navigator.': Maintainability
'98% of the user workstations shall meet the minimum software requirements prior to implementation: Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0. Microsoft .NET Framework 1.1. Microsoft Internet Explorer Web Controls': Compatibility
'The WCS system shall be run in a Windows environment. The WCS shall be accessed by users through the Internet on an IBM computer running a Windows 2000 or above operating system.': Compatibility
'The product shall be able to support multiple remote users': Performance Efficiency
'The product should be able to be used by 90% of novice users on the Internet.': Usability
'The product shall be supported using the corporate support center.': Compatibility

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product must support Internet Explorer 5.5 and above.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

'The system shall notify customers of changes to its information policy.': Security

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall reveal private information only in compliance with the organization’s information policy.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'An anonymous survey will show that 95% of customers are comfortable using and purchasing pre-paid cards after a month of using the system.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The server will support a maximum of 1 000 simultaneous users.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be able to support multiple remote users': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be able to handle up to 1500 simultaneous users. The system shall perform with 1500 users as a time.': Performance Efficiency

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall be able support 1000 simultaneous users.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The audit report shall be available to other adjusters at later points in time.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The maximum wait time for a user navigating from one screen to another within the Disputes application shall be no more than 5 seconds.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to a Clinical Lab Section including the clinical site name the department/section for the lab the class instructor day and time of lab and contact information.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The Disputes System must provide Search functionality. The search method must include the ability to search by (1) the dispute case number (2) the merchant account number (3) the cardmember account number and (4) the issuer number. In addition to the above criteria the search functionality must further allow the user to limit the results of the search by a date range the type of dispute (ticket retrieval request or chargeback notification) the case status (open closed or all) and the dispute reason code.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The leads washing functionality will use the parameters supplied by corporate and schools to score part of the lead.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The website shall achieve 99.5% up time.': Reliability
'Aside from server failure the software product shall achieve 99.99% up time.': Reliability
'The product shall achieve a 98% uptime. The product shall not fail more than 2% of the available online time.': Reliability
'The product shall be able to handle up to 1500 simultaneous users. The system shall perform with 1500 users as a time.': Performance Efficiency
'The Dispute System shall provide the users with the ability to follow up on a dispute case via follow-up actions. The list of available follow up actions for a given dispute case must be filtered by the status of the case and the access level of the user.': Functional Suitability
'The response time shall be fast enough to maintain the flow of the game. The response time shall be no more than 2 seconds for 95% of responses and no more than 4% for the remaining responses.': Performance Efficiency
'The response time shall be fast enough to maintain the flow of the game. The response time shall be no more than 2 seconds for 95% of responses and no more than 4% for the remaining responses.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall allow a user to define the time segments': Functional Suitability

On a 56k connection the system response time for all operations must be no more than 6 seconds 90% of the time.': Performance Efficiency

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall achieve 95% up time.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a new cohort to the system identified by start month and year.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'New branches/complexes/districts/regions and revenue/expense accounts added to the BDW must be reflected in the RFS system. 100% of the entities (mentioned above) available as of October month-end will be loaded into the RFS system prior to the budget start process.': Maintainability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'All registered customer information shall be stored and maintained in the database even after the customer cancels their account.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall be capable of processing 100% of nursing students and their classes for the next 10 years.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'A user shall be able to use the system without instruction after a short amount of time. After one use a user should understand and remember 90% of the system usage and navigation.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Any disputes cases that have been closed for over 6 months must be purged from the online disputes database.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: On a 112k connection or faster the system response time for all operations must be no more than 3 seconds 90% of the time.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Application updates shall occur between 3AM and 6 AM CST on Wednesday morning during the middle of the NFL season.'

Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to a Clinical Site including the clinical site name site contact person contact information and address.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall provide Dynamic Change Support and Transparent resource addition.The product shall support Transparent Resource addition and Dynamic Change support to provide scalability and avoid service interruptions of more than 1 day.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

'New System version releases shall be released at the beginning of each NFL season.': Maintainability
'90% of untrained realtors shall be able to install the product on their device without printed instructions': Usability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Formula substitutionary ingredients shall be kept in persisted order'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
